title: Lowboy Trailer
motivation: A reliable solution for transporting heavy machinery and oversized loads with specialized design.
infoTitle: Ideal for Heavy and Over-Height Loads
infoText: Lowboy trailers are designed with a low deck height to transport construction machines, industrial equipment, and oversized cargo. Reinforced chassis and strong axles ensure safety and durability throughout the route.

items.name: 2-Axle Lowboy Trailer
items.shortDesc: Suitable for medium-heavy loads with high maneuverability.

items.name: 3-Axle Lowboy Trailer
items.shortDesc: Designed for heavier and larger loads across long distances.
